name: Super Squares – Free Puzzle Game
description:
Super Squares is a fancy new puzzle game that'll keep you busy for hours.

Collect stars, connect colours, and blow up bricks with bombs!

It's the perfect game to play while you're waiting in line, sitting on the bus, ignoring your teacher, or dropping the kids off at the pool.

You can play Super Squares on your iPhone and iPad – your progress is always in sync so you can continue right from where you left off.

Download it now for free. We think you'll love it :)
